Author: rainbowfuze
Text: I felt the same, that comment really struck me and I think it holds true. Once you develop one, I just don't see how it could ever go away. Lisa and she both agreed that their location/livelihood makes it all the more difficult.

Author: californiabeautiful
Text: I didn’t see it but I did read about it and I used to watch the show. I think she was really brave for putting it out there like that. It takes a lot to tell the whole world you have an eating disorder. I couldn’t even imagine doing something like that.   The one thing that struck me was when she said she’ll never be over it. I don’t know if people truly get over EDs. I’ve had one for 15-16 years now so I’m definitely not the authority on that by any means. I just think LA is probably the worst environment to be in for ED recovery. Everything in LA is about appearances and everyone looks amazing, especially when you’re more in the celebrity social circles. I guess I just wonder if she would have a better chance of recovery if she lived somewhere normal.
